SELECT A.id AS woId, A.wo_code AS woCode, A.status AS woStatus, A.work_date AS workDate,
B.id AS lineId, B.line_name AS lineName,
D.name AS materialName, D.spec AS materialSpec, D.base_unit AS baseUnit,
A.quantity AS plannedQuantity
FROM work_order A JOIN production_line B ON A.line_id = B.id
JOIN line_material C ON C.line_id = B.id
JOIN material D ON C.material_id = D.id
WHERE A.work_date = #{date}
ORDER BY B.line_name ASC, A.wo_code ASC
